sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Returns the size of a variable. There are two syntaxes for its use. The first syntax returns the size of the array as a vector of integers, one integer for each dimension [d1,d2,...,dn] = size(x) The other format returns the size of x along a particular dimension: d = size(x,n) where n is the dimension along which to return the size.

sect1.title: Example
sect1.para: Here is an example of the second form of size.
